Articles.Content: Hey Guys its me L3GO again and i had some fun today taking the Porta Potty to the island runway due to the toilets being clogged!! So how did it all go down you ask well here it is.
This reminds me of the time I dropped capsules on each of the islands. Is this a challenge? Should people have a go?
Yea if they want to. I was going to do a series on taking the toilets to each planet. It sorta has a good ring to it. Also that project will be underway soon just got 1 or 2 things left to do.
